<title level="1" right="Trait">[Mutagen](/Traits.aspx?ID=116)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 634 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

An [elixir](/Traits.aspx?ID=59) with the mutagen trait temporarily transmogrifies the subject's body and alters its mind. A mutagen always conveys one or more beneficial effects paired with one or more detrimental effects. Mutagens are [polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127) effects, meaning you can benefit from only one at a time.
